Name: More Stars
Desc: Every 5 moves, adds 1 Compass that can merge with any block (except Compass).

Name: More Stars
Desc: Every 7 moves, adds 1 Compass that can merge with any block (except Compass).

Name: More Stones
Desc: Every 10 moves, adds 1 Stone block that disappears after being bumped for the required number of times.

Name: More Ice
Desc: Every 10 moves, adds 1 Ballast that is immovable and becomes a Power Core after merging.

Name: Extra Conduction
Desc: Adds 1 Hub every 10 moves. When any adjacent block's value doubles due to a Beacon, this block's value multiplies by 2.

Name: More Time+
Desc: Every 10 moves, adds 1 Power Core that records a value after merging. The value will be added to the number of Enhanced Moves upon board level up.

Name: More Doubles
Desc: Every 10 moves, adds 1 Beacon that can double the value of adjacent blocks (except Beacon) after merging.

Name: More Blocks
Desc: Generates again based on the current board rules.

Name: More Doubles
Desc: Every 7 moves, adds 1 Beacon that can double the value of adjacent blocks (except Beacon) after merging.

Name: More Doubles
Desc: Every 10 moves, adds 1 Beacon that can double the value of adjacent blocks (except Beacon) after merging.

Name: Add Star Block
Desc: Star Block can merge with any numbered block except Bubble Blocks.

Name: Add Star Block
Desc: Star Block can merge with any numbered block except Bubble Blocks.

Name: Add Runner Block
Desc: Teleports the Bubble Block to the position that maximizes its clearing range.

Name: Add Runner Block
Desc: Teleports the Bubble Block to the position that maximizes its clearing range.

Name: More Heart Blocks
Desc: Create Heart Blocks. After Heart Blocks merges 3 times, the Bubble Blocks will reach the target number immediately.

Name: More Hot Blocks
Desc: Create Hot Blocks. Merge with Cold Blocks to generate a random block.

Name: More Cold Blocks
Desc: Create Cold Blocks. Merge with Hot Blocks to generate a random block.

Name: More Clump Blocks
Desc: Clump Blocks need a few hits to break. The number shows how many hits it takes.

Name: More Star Blocks
Desc: Star Blocks can merge with any numbered block except Bubble Blocks.
